name: stars (itch)
description:
full screen please — bottom right corner!

hello there! this is a very short, very soft game. it has music in it so please have your volume on or headphones/earphones in. it is about 188 words long.

the background music is made by me! i've included it as an optional download if anyone would like to listen to it again. thank you !!

made for twinyjam 2015

some nice things people wrote about stars: here and here and here and here
